content: around join to the top of the first spc 50 round 6 chain 2 spc in each st around join to the top of the first spc 50 round 7 12 repeat round 6 round 13 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join to the first half_double_crochet round 14 chain 1 single_crochet in each st around join to the first single_crochet fasten_off and sew in all loose ends caring for your piece hand wash in cool water do not rub or wring squeeze out excess water then spin in washing machine or roll in towels to remove rest of water lay flat to dry out of direct sunlight and shape to original measurements the steady hand crochet patterns by aprile mazey aprile@thesteadyhandshop com please do not share or publish this pattern finished items may be sold i would very much appreciate it if you would credit aprile mazey for the pattern design and include a link to http //www thesteadyhandshop com all pictures in this pdf are the property of the steady hand please do not copy or use any of my photos in this document or online thanks
